data.name: Anti-Nightmare Master Plan
data.detailed_description:
Day and night

This survival roguelite cycle consists of day and night.
Improve your basic abilities and plan your weapon skill paths during the day. Use randomly obtained weapons from your unlocked set and collect random ability upgrades to survive the nightmare at night.

Features

  • Unlock playable toy characters and fight for your owner to free his dreams
  • Protect the dreamer every night again from masses of nightmare monsters using up to 4 auto-firing weapons at the same time
  • Collect random ability upgrades during the nightmare
  • Improve your basic abilities to withstand the nightmare longer
  • Discover unique fantastic weapons

  • For each weapon create your own skill path which is used to level up your weapon during the nightmare

data.short_description: Wipe out superior forces of nightmare monsters and protect the dreamer. Create your own unique skill path for a variety of weapons. Evolve through a rogue-lite system and overcome the nightmares.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 and Windows 11, 64-bit versions only.
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K @ 3.3 GHz or AMD FX-8350 @ 4.0 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 680
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX 10 compatible sound card
